Welcome to Uras Uyal's website! Uras is a Freshman at Pomona College intending to major in Mathematics and Computer Science, and considering a minor in either Data Science or Physics. He is also interested in Geography, History, and Music as side hobbies.

Uras has lived in 4 different countries: Turkey, Cyprus, Germany, and the United States. He brings a diverse international perspective combining quantitative thinking with a command of history and social analysis and prediction. He speaks Turkish and English fluently and has German background.
